synopsis.text:
September 25 marks the beginning of a thrilling journey for a group of young women living in the Nezumi-sou dormitory, an establishment under Rat Production. This dormitory houses former idols, child actors, musicians, and models, all of whom have experienced setbacks in their respective careers. Among them is Ino Sakura, a young girl who has always dreamt of becoming an idol. However, just as Sakura moves in, the dormitory faces an imminent threat of demolition due to an overwhelming debt of 100 million yen.

In an effort to save their home and repay the debt, the girls embark on a daring mission under the guidance of their manager, Hoho Kajino. They form an idol group named 'Fruit Tart' and begin performing at various locations, hoping to attract attention and generate revenue. As they strive to make their mark in the competitive world of idol entertainment, the girls of Fruit Tart must overcome their past failures and work together to achieve their dreams. Will they be able to save their home and realize their ambitions, or will their dreams crumble under the weight of their debt? Join Fruit Tart on their inspiring journey of resilience, friendship, and determination.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
